title: Tips for Gospel Conversations
itunes:author: Guests: Courtney DeFeo
itunes:summary:
You don't need to be a theologian to teach your kids about God. John and Danny share how to explain the gospel to younger children. Featuring Courtney DeFeo.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.
